pkgmetadata.longdescription: Summary Statistics for Panel Data // Based on 'STATA' xtsum command, it is used to compute summary statistics for a panel data set. It generates overall, between-group, and within-group statistics for specified variables in a panel data set, as presented in S. Porter (2023) https://stephenporter.org/files/xtsum_handout.pdf, StataCorp (2023) https://www.stata.com/manuals/xtxtsum.pdf.
